amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate on the nomination of an individual to serve as Director of Operational Test and Evaluation of the Department of Defense on a permanent basis.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4287 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4287 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5937) Expressing the sense of the Senate on the nomination of an individual to serve as Director of Operational Test and Evaluation of the Department of Defense on a permanent basis.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4287 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4287 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
